name: East Scarborough Storefront
address: 4040 Lawrence Ave E, Scarborough, ON M1E 2R6
description: The East Scarborough Storefront harnesses the power of collaboration to support people and build community in one of the most diverse and marginalized neighbourhoods in East Scarborough.

name: Scarborough Centre for Healthy Communities (SCHC)
address: 4100 Lawrence Ave E, Scarborough, ON M1E 2S2
description: SCHC provides accessible, equitable, and transformational health and social service choices to enhance the well-being of diverse communities.

name: West Hill Community Support Program / Friends of Jesus Christ Food Bank
address: 4234 Lawrence Ave E #8, Scarborough, ON M1E 2S5
description: This organization provides essential services to combat food insecurity and offers direct access to food for all community members in need.

name: Boys & Girls Club of East Scarborough
description: A trusted partner in building successful families within the community. Provides a safe and supportive environment for children, youth, and families.

name: Curran Hall Community Centre
address: 277 Orton Park Rd, Scarborough, ON M1G 3T4
